mapper.select:
SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT t1.PARTNER_ID , t1.STATUS , t1.PARTNER_NAME , t1.SOFTWARE_NAME , t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION , t1.DELIVERY_FORM , t1.PUBLIC_YN , t1.DESCRIPTION , t1.COMMENT , t1.CONFIRMATION_FILE_ID , t1.OSS_FILE_ID , t1.BINARY_FILE_ID , t1.REVIEWER , t8.USER_NAME AS REVIEWER_NAME , t1.USE_YN , t2.USER_NAME AS CREATOR , t1.CREATED_DATE , t1.MODIFIER , t1.MODIFIED_DATE , t3.CD_DTL_NM AS DIVISION , t6.ORIG_NM as FILE_NAME , t7.ORIG_NM as FILE_NAME2 , t3.CD_DTL_NO , t5.LICENSE_NAME , t4.OSS_NAME , t4.OSS_VERSION , t1.CREATOR AS CREATOR_ID , t4.FILE_PATH , t2.USER_ID
, t9.PRJ_ID
, (CASE WHEN t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION = '' THEN 1 WHEN t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION REGEXP '^[0-9\.]+' THEN 2 WHEN t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION REGEXP '^[a-z]+' THEN 3 ELSE 4 END) AS SEQ , SUBSTRING_INDEX((CASE WHEN t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION REGEXP '^[0-9]+' THEN t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION END), '.', 1)+0 AS MAJOR_VERSION , IF(t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION REGEXP '[\.]{1}' , SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX((CASE WHEN t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION REGEXP '^[0-9]+' THEN t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION END), '.', 2), '.', -1)+0 , NULL) AS MINOR_VERSION , IF(t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION REGEXP '[\.]{1}' , SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX((CASE WHEN t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION REGEXP '^[0-9]+' THEN t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION END), '.', 3), '.', -1)+0 , NULL) AS PATCH_VERSION , LENGTH(t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION) AS VERSION_LEN , ASCII(SUBSTRING(t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION, 1)) AS ASCII
FROM PARTNER_MASTER t1 LEFT JOIN T2_USERS t2 ON t1.CREATOR = t2.USER_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '200') t3 ON t1.DIVISION = t3.CD_DTL_NO LEFT JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS t4 ON t1.PARTNER_ID = t4.REFERENCE_ID AND t4.REFERENCE_DIV = '20' LEFT JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE t5 ON t4.COMPONENT_ID = t5.COMPONENT_ID LEFT JOIN T2_FILE t6 ON t6.FILE_SEQ = t1.CONFIRMATION_FILE_ID LEFT JOIN T2_FILE t7 ON t7.FILE_SEQ = t1.OSS_FILE_ID LEFT JOIN T2_USERS t8 ON t1.REVIEWER = t8.USER_ID
LEFT JOIN (SELECT PARTNER_ID, GROUP_CONCAT(PRJ_ID ORDER BY PRJ_ID ASC) AS PRJ_ID FROM PROJECT_PARTNER_MAP GROUP BY PARTNER_ID) t9 ON t1.PARTNER_ID = t9.PARTNER_ID
LEFT JOIN T2_FILE t10 ON t10.FILE_SEQ = t1.BINARY_FILE_ID ) A WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND (A.CREATOR = #{loginUserName} OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM PARTNER_WATCHER A1 WHERE A1.PARTNER_ID = A.PARTNER_ID AND (A1.USER_ID = #{loginUserName} OR (A1.USER_ID = 'all' AND A1.DIVISION = (SELECT DIVISION FROM T2_USERS A2 WHERE A2.USER_ID = #{loginUserName})) ) )
OR A.PUBLIC_YN = 'Y'
)
AND A.PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId}
AND A.OSS_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ossName},'%')
AND A.OSS_VERSION LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ossVersion},'%')
AND A.LICENSE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{licenseName},'%')
AND A.STATUS = #{status}
#{item}
AND A.PARTNER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{partnerName},'%')
AND A.SOFTWARE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{softwareName},'%')
AND A.SOFTWARE_VERSION LIKE CONCAT(#{softwareVersion},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATED_DATE,'%Y%m%d') >= #{createdDate1}
AND DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATED_DATE,'%Y%m%d') <= #{createdDate2}
AND A.CD_DTL_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{division},'%')
AND A.CREATOR_ID IN (SELECT X.USER_ID FROM T2_USERS X WHERE X.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{creator},'%'))
AND A.MODIFIER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{modifier},'%')
AND A.REVIEWER IS NULL
AND A.REVIEWER IN (SELECT X.USER_ID FROM T2_USERS X WHERE X.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{reviewer},'%'))
AND A.FILE_PATH LIKE CONCAT('%',#{binaryName})
GROUP BY A.PARTNER_ID
ORDER BY A.PARTNER_ID ASC
ORDER BY A.PARTNER_ID DESC
ORDER BY A.PARTNER_NAME ASC
ORDER BY A.PARTNER_NAME DESC
ORDER BY A.SOFTWARE_NAME ASC
ORDER BY A.SOFTWARE_NAME DESC
ORDER BY A.SEQ ASC , A.MAJOR_VERSION ASC , BINARY ( CASE WHEN A.SOFTWARE_VERSION REGEXP '^[a-zA-Z]+' THEN SOFTWARE_VERSION END ) ASC , A.ASCII ASC , A.MINOR_VERSION ASC , A.PATCH_VERSION ASC , A.VERSION_LEN ASC
ORDER BY A.SEQ DESC , A.MAJOR_VERSION DESC , BINARY ( CASE WHEN A.SOFTWARE_VERSION REGEXP '^[a-zA-Z]+' THEN SOFTWARE_VERSION END ) DESC , A.ASCII DESC , A.MINOR_VERSION DESC , A.PATCH_VERSION DESC , A.VERSION_LEN DESC
ORDER BY A.STATUS ASC
ORDER BY A.STATUS DESC
ORDER BY A.DELIVERY_FORM ASC
ORDER BY A.DELIVERY_FORM DESC
ORDER BY A.DESCRIPTION ASC
ORDER BY A.DESCRIPTION DESC
ORDER BY A.DIVISION ASC
ORDER BY A.DIVISION DESC
ORDER BY A.CREATOR ASC
ORDER BY A.CREATOR DESC
ORDER BY A.CREATED_DATE ASC
ORDER BY A.CREATED_DATE DESC
ORDER BY A.MODIFIED_DATE ASC
ORDER BY A.MODIFIED_DATE DESC
ORDER BY A.REVIEWER_NAME ASC
ORDER BY A.REVIEWER_NAME DESC
ORDER BY A.COMMENT ASC
ORDER BY A.COMMENT DESC

SELECT DISTINCT T1.PARTNER_NAME FROM PARTNER_MASTER T1 WHERE T1.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND T1.STATUS = #{status}
AND ( T1.CREATOR = #{creator} OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM PARTNER_WATCHER A1
WHERE A1.PARTNER_ID = T1.PARTNER_ID AND (A1.USER_ID = #{creator} OR ( A1.USER_ID = 'all' AND A1.DIVISION = (SELECT DIVISION FROM T2_USERS A2 WHERE A2.USER_ID = #{creator}) )) ) OR T1.PUBLIC_YN = 'Y' )

SELECT DISTINCT T1.SOFTWARE_NAME FROM PARTNER_MASTER T1 WHERE T1.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND T1.STATUS = #{status}
AND ( T1.CREATOR = #{creator} OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM PARTNER_WATCHER A1
WHERE A1.PARTNER_ID = T1.PARTNER_ID AND (A1.USER_ID = #{creator} OR ( A1.USER_ID = 'all' AND A1.DIVISION = (SELECT DIVISION FROM T2_USERS A2 WHERE A2.USER_ID = #{creator}) )) ) OR T1.PUBLIC_YN = 'Y' )

SELECT DISTINCT T1.SOFTWARE_VERSION FROM PARTNER_MASTER T1 WHERE T1.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND T1.STATUS = #{status}
AND ( T1.CREATOR = #{creator} OR EXISTS ( SELECT A1.PARTNER_ID, A1.DIVISION, A2.USER_ID FROM PARTNER_WATCHER A1
WHERE A1.PARTNER_ID = T1.PARTNER_ID (A1.USER_ID = #{creator} OR ( A1.USER_ID = 'all' AND A1.DIVISION = (SELECT DIVISION FROM T2_USERS A2 WHERE A2.USER_ID = #{creator}) )) ) OR T1.PUBLIC_YN = 'Y' )
SELECT MAX(PARTNER_ID) FROM PARTNER_MASTER

SELECT t1.* ,t2.ORIG_NM AS FILE_NAME , t3.ORIG_NM AS FILE_NAME2 , t4.USER_NAME AS CREATOR_NAME , t5.USER_NAME AS REVIEWER_NAME FROM PARTNER_MASTER t1 LEFT JOIN T2_FILE t2 ON t1.CONFIRMATION_FILE_ID = t2.FILE_SEQ LEFT JOIN T2_FILE t3 ON t1.OSS_FILE_ID = t3.FILE_SEQ LEFT JOIN T2_USERS t4 ON t1.CREATOR = t4.USER_ID LEFT JOIN T2_USERS t5 ON t1.REVIEWER = t5.USER_ID WHERE PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId}

SELECT T1.PARTNER_ID , T1.DIVISION , T1.USER_ID , T2.USER_NAME , T1.EMAIL , T2.USE_YN AS USER_USE_YN , T3.USE_YN AS DEPT_USE_YN FROM PARTNER_WATCHER T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN T2_USERS T2 ON T1.USER_ID = T2.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN T2_CODE_DTL T3 ON T1.DIVISION = T3.CD_DTL_NO AND T3.CD_NO = '200' WHERE T1.PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId}
mapper.update: UPDATE PARTNER_MASTER SET USE_YN = 'N' WHERE PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId}
UPDATE PARTNER_MASTER SET COMMENT = '' WHERE PARTNER_ID = #{referenceId}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.* , t2.LICENSE_NAME AS LICENSE_NAME FROM OSS_LICENSE_DECLARED t1 LEFT JOIN LICENSE_MASTER t2 ON t1.LICENSE_ID = t2.LICENSE_ID WHERE OSS_ID = #{ossId}

/* PartnerMapper.getPartnerOssAllList */ SELECT T1.COMPONENT_ID, T1.REFERENCE_ID, T1.REFERENCE_DIV, T1.OSS_ID, T1.OSS_NAME, T1.OSS_VERSION , T1.DOWNLOAD_LOCATION, T1.HOMEPAGE, T1.FILE_PATH, T1.EXCLUDE_YN , T2.COMPONENT_LICENSE_ID, T2.LICENSE_ID, T2.LICENSE_NAME, T2.LICENSE_TEXT, T2.COPYRIGHT_TEXT, T2.EXCLUDE_YN AS S_EXCLUDE_YN FROM OSS_COMPONENTS T1 INNER JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE T2 ON T1.COMPONENT_ID = T2.COMPONENT_ID WHERE T1.REFERENCE_DIV = '20' AND T1.REFERENCE_ID = #{referenceId} ORDER BY COMPONENT_ID, COMPONENT_LICENSE_ID
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{partnerId} AND REFERENCE_DIV = '20'
mapper.select: SELECT COMPONENT_ID FROM OSS_COMPONENTS WHERE REFERENCE_ID = #{partnerId} AND REFERENCE_DIV = '20'
SELECT MAX(COMPONENT_ID) FROM OSS_COMPONENTS
SELECT LICENSE_ID FROM LICENSE_MASTER WHERE LICENSE_NAME = #{licenseName}

SELECT t1.PARTNER_ID , t1.STATUS , t1.PARTNER_NAME , t1.SOFTWARE_NAME , t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION , t1.DELIVERY_FORM , t1.PUBLIC_YN , t1.DESCRIPTION , t1.COMMENT , t1.CONFIRMATION_FILE_ID , t1.OSS_FILE_ID , t1.BINARY_FILE_ID , t1.REVIEWER , t1.USE_YN , t2.USER_NAME AS CREATOR , t1.CREATED_DATE , t1.MODIFIER , t1.MODIFIED_DATE , (SELECT CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '200' AND CD_DTL_NO = t1.DIVISION) AS DIVISION , (SELECT A1.ORIG_NM FROM T2_FILE A1 WHERE A1.FILE_SEQ = t1.CONFIRMATION_FILE_ID) as FILE_NAME , (SELECT A2.ORIG_NM FROM T2_FILE A2 WHERE A2.FILE_SEQ = t1.OSS_FILE_ID) as FILE_NAME2
, t7.PRJ_ID
FROM PARTNER_MASTER t1 LEFT JOIN T2_USERS t2 ON t1.CREATOR = t2.USER_ID
LEFT JOIN PARTNER_WATCHER t4 ON t1.PARTNER_ID = t4.PARTNER_ID LEFT JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS t5 ON t1.PARTNER_ID = t5.REFERENCE_ID AND t5.REFERENCE_DIV = '20' LEFT JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE t6 ON t5.COMPONENT_ID = t6.COMPONENT_ID LEFT JOIN T2_USERS t8 ON t1.REVIEWER = t8.USER_ID
LEFT JOIN (SELECT PARTNER_ID, GROUP_CONCAT(PRJ_ID ORDER BY PRJ_ID ASC) AS PRJ_ID FROM PROJECT_PARTNER_MAP GROUP BY PARTNER_ID) t7 ON t1.PARTNER_ID = t7.PARTNER_ID
WHERE t1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND ( t1.CREATOR = #{loginUserName} OR t4.USER_ID = #{loginUserName} OR (t4.USER_ID = 'all' AND t4.DIVISION = (SELECT DIVISION FROM T2_USERS A2 WHERE A2.USER_ID = #{loginUserName}))
OR t1.PUBLIC_YN = 'Y'
)
AND t1.PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId}
AND t5.OSS_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',REGEXP_REPLACE(#{ossName}, '_', '\\\\_'),'%')
AND t5.OSS_VERSION LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ossVersion},'%')
AND t6.LICENSE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',REGEXP_REPLACE(#{licenseName}, '_', '\\\\_'),'%')
AND t1.STATUS = #{status}
#{item}
AND t1.PARTNER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',REGEXP_REPLACE(#{partnerName}, '_', '\\\\_'),'%')
AND t1.SOFTWARE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',REGEXP_REPLACE(#{softwareName}, '_', '\\\\_'),'%')
AND t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION LIKE CONCAT('%',REGEXP_REPLACE(#{softwareVersion}, '_', '\\\\_'),'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(t1.CREATED_DATE,'%Y%m%d') >= #{createdDate1}
AND DATE_FORMAT(t1.CREATED_DATE,'%Y%m%d') <= #{createdDate2}
AND t1.DIVISION = #{division}
AND t1.CREATOR IN (SELECT X.USER_ID FROM T2_USERS X WHERE X.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{creator},'%'))
AND t1.MODIFIER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{modifier},'%')
AND t1.REVIEWER IS NULL
AND t1.REVIEWER IN (SELECT X.USER_ID FROM T2_USERS X WHERE X.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{reviewer},'%'))
AND t5.FILE_PATH LIKE CONCAT('%',REGEXP_REPLACE(#{binaryName}, '_', '\\\\_'))
GROUP BY t1.PARTNER_ID
ORDER BY t1.PARTNER_ID ASC
ORDER BY t1.PARTNER_ID DESC
ORDER BY t1.PARTNER_NAME ASC
ORDER BY t1.PARTNER_NAME DESC
ORDER BY t1.SOFTWARE_NAME ASC
ORDER BY t1.SOFTWARE_NAME DESC
ORDER BY t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION ASC
ORDER BY t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION DESC
ORDER BY t1.STATUS ASC
ORDER BY t1.STATUS DESC
ORDER BY t1.DELIVERY_FORM ASC
ORDER BY t1.DELIVERY_FORM DESC
ORDER BY t1.DESCRIPTION ASC
ORDER BY t1.DESCRIPTION DESC
ORDER BY t1.DIVISION ASC
ORDER BY t1.DIVISION DESC
ORDER BY t2.USER_NAME ASC
ORDER BY t2.USER_NAME DESC
ORDER BY t1.CREATED_DATE ASC
ORDER BY t1.CREATED_DATE DESC
ORDER BY t1.MODIFIED_DATE ASC
ORDER BY t1.MODIFIED_DATE DESC
ORDER BY t8.USER_NAME ASC
ORDER BY t8.USER_NAME DESC
ORDER BY t1.COMMENT ASC
ORDER BY t1.COMMENT DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PARTNER_WATCHER WHERE EMAIL = #{parEmail} AND PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PARTNER_WATCHER WHERE PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId} AND DIVISION = #{parDivision} AND (USER_ID = 'ALL' OR USER_ID = #{parUserId})
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PARTNER_MASTER WHERE PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PARTNER_WATCHER (PARTNER_ID, DIVISION, USER_ID, EMAIL) VALUES (#{partnerId}, #{parDivision}, #{parUserId}, #{parEmail})
mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL FROM PARTNER_WATCHER WHERE IFNULL(EMAIL, '') <> '' AND PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId}
mapper.update: UPDATE OSS_COMPONENTS A1 LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_NICKNAME A2 ON A1.OSS_NAME = A2.OSS_NICKNAME LEFT OUTER JOIN OSS_MASTER A3 ON (A1.OSS_NAME = A3.OSS_NAME OR A2.OSS_NAME = A3.OSS_NAME) AND IFNULL(A1.OSS_VERSION, '') = IFNULL(A3.OSS_VERSION, '') SET A1.OSS_ID = A3.OSS_ID, A1.OSS_NAME = IFNULL(A3.OSS_NAME, A1.OSS_NAME) WHERE A1.REFERENCE_ID = #{partnerId} AND A1.REFERENCE_DIV = '20' AND A3.USE_YN = 'Y' AND IFNULL(A1.OSS_NAME, '') <> ''
mapper.select: SELECT B.COMPONENT_COUNT , A.* FROM PARTNER_MASTER A INNER JOIN PROJECT_PARTNER_MAP B ON A.PARTNER_ID = B.PARTNER_ID WHERE B.PRJ_ID = #{prjId}
SELECT T1.* , DATE_FORMAT(T1.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS CREATED_DATE FROM T2_FILE T1 WHERE T1.FILE_ID = #{documentsFileId} AND T1.DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS DOCUMENTS_FILE_CNT FROM T2_FILE WHERE FILE_ID = #{documentsFileId} AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT t1.PARTNER_ID , t1.STATUS , t1.PARTNER_NAME , t1.SOFTWARE_NAME , t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION , t1.DELIVERY_FORM , t1.PUBLIC_YN , t1.DESCRIPTION , t1.COMMENT , t1.CONFIRMATION_FILE_ID , t1.OSS_FILE_ID , t1.BINARY_FILE_ID , t1.REVIEWER , t1.USE_YN , t2.USER_NAME AS CREATOR , t1.CREATED_DATE , t1.MODIFIER , t1.MODIFIED_DATE , (SELECT CD_DTL_NM FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '200' AND CD_DTL_NO = t1.DIVISION) AS DIVISION , (SELECT A1.ORIG_NM FROM T2_FILE A1 WHERE A1.FILE_SEQ = t1.CONFIRMATION_FILE_ID) as FILE_NAME , (SELECT A2.ORIG_NM FROM T2_FILE A2 WHERE A2.FILE_SEQ = t1.OSS_FILE_ID) as FILE_NAME2
, t7.PRJ_ID
FROM PARTNER_MASTER t1 LEFT JOIN T2_USERS t2 ON t1.CREATOR = t2.USER_ID
LEFT JOIN PARTNER_WATCHER t4 ON t1.PARTNER_ID = t4.PARTNER_ID LEFT JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS t5 ON t1.PARTNER_ID = t5.REFERENCE_ID AND t5.REFERENCE_DIV = '20' LEFT JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE t6 ON t5.COMPONENT_ID = t6.COMPONENT_ID
LEFT JOIN (SELECT PARTNER_ID, GROUP_CONCAT(PRJ_ID ORDER BY PRJ_ID ASC) AS PRJ_ID FROM PROJECT_PARTNER_MAP GROUP BY PARTNER_ID) t7 ON t1.PARTNER_ID = t7.PARTNER_ID
WHERE t1.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND t1.PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId}
AND t5.OSS_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ossName},'%')
AND t6.LICENSE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{licenseName},'%')
AND t1.STATUS = #{status}
#{item}
AND t1.PARTNER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{partnerName},'%')
AND t1.SOFTWARE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{softwareName},'%')
AND t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION LIKE CONCAT('%',#{softwareVersion},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(t1.CREATED_DATE,'%Y%m%d') >= #{createdDate1}
AND DATE_FORMAT(t1.CREATED_DATE,'%Y%m%d') <= #{createdDate2}
AND t1.DIVISION = #{division}
AND t1.CREATOR IN (SELECT X.USER_ID FROM T2_USERS X WHERE X.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{creator},'%'))
AND t1.MODIFIER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{modifier},'%')
AND t1.REVIEWER IS NULL
AND t1.REVIEWER IN (SELECT X.USER_ID FROM T2_USERS X WHERE X.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{reviewer},'%'))
AND t5.FILE_PATH LIKE CONCAT('%',#{binaryName})
GROUP BY t1.PARTNER_ID
ORDER BY t1.PARTNER_ID ASC
ORDER BY t1.PARTNER_ID DESC
ORDER BY t1.PARTNER_NAME ASC
ORDER BY t1.PARTNER_NAME DESC
ORDER BY t1.SOFTWARE_NAME ASC
ORDER BY t1.SOFTWARE_NAME DESC
ORDER BY t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION ASC
ORDER BY t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION DESC
ORDER BY t1.STATUS ASC
ORDER BY t1.STATUS DESC
ORDER BY t1.DELIVERY_FORM ASC
ORDER BY t1.DELIVERY_FORM DESC
ORDER BY t1.DESCRIPTION ASC
ORDER BY t1.DESCRIPTION DESC
ORDER BY t1.DIVISION ASC
ORDER BY t1.DIVISION DESC
ORDER BY t1.CREATOR ASC
ORDER BY t1.CREATOR DESC
ORDER BY t1.CREATED_DATE ASC
ORDER BY t1.CREATED_DATE DESC
ORDER BY t1.REVIEWER ASC
ORDER BY t1.REVIEWER DESC
ORDER BY t1.COMMENT ASC
ORDER BY t1.COMMENT DESC

/* PartnerMapper.selectOssRefPartnerList */ SELECT T1.PARTNER_ID , T1.PARTNER_NAME , T1.SOFTWARE_NAME , T1.SOFTWARE_VERSION , T1.MODIFIED_DATE FROM PARTNER_MASTER T1 WHERE T1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND T1.STATUS = 'CONF' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM OSS_COMPONENTS A INNER JOIN (SELECT SUB1.OSS_ID , SUB1.OSS_NAME , SUB1.OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_MASTER SUB1 WHERE SUB1.OSS_ID = #{ossId} UNION ALL SELECT SUB1.OSS_ID , SUB2.OSS_NICKNAME AS OSS_NAME , SUB1.OSS_VERSION FROM OSS_MASTER SUB1 INNER JOIN OSS_NICKNAME SUB2 ON SUB1.OSS_NAME = SUB2.OSS_NAME WHERE SUB1.OSS_ID = #{ossId}) B ON A.OSS_NAME = B.OSS_NAME AND IFNULL(B.OSS_VERSION, '') = IFNULL(A.OSS_VERSION, '') WHERE T1.PARTNER_ID = A.REFERENCE_ID AND A.REFERENCE_DIV IN ( '20' ) AND A.EXCLUDE_YN = 'N')
AND ( T1.CREATOR = #{loginUserName} OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM PARTNER_WATCHER A1
WHERE A1.PARTNER_ID = T1.PARTNER_ID AND (A1.USER_ID = #{loginUserName} OR (A1.USER_ID = 'all' AND A1.DIVISION = (SELECT DIVISION FROM T2_USERS A2 WHERE A2.USER_ID = #{loginUserName}) )) ) )
ORDER BY MODIFIED_DATE DESC LIMIT 100
SELECT PRJ_ID , STATUS AS OSS_ANALYSIS_STATUS , CREATED_DATE , CREATOR , ANALYSIS_START_DATE , ANALYSIS_END_DATE , MODIFIED_DATE , MODIFIER FROM OSS_ANALYSIS_STATUS WHERE PRJ_ID = #{partnerId}

SELECT T1.COMPONENT_ID, T1.BINARY_NAME, T1.OSS_NAME, T1.OSS_VERSION, T1.FILE_PATH, T1.EXCLUDE_YN, T1.BINARY_NOTICE, T1.CUSTOM_BINARY_YN, T1.REFERENCE_ID, T1.REFERENCE_DIV FROM OSS_COMPONENTS T1 INNER JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE T2 ON T1.COMPONENT_ID = T2.COMPONENT_ID AND IFNULL(T2.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND IFNULL(T2.LICENSE_NAME, '') = '' WHERE T1.REFERENCE_ID = #{partnerId} AND T1.REFERENCE_DIV = '20' AND IFNULL(T1.EXCLUDE_YN, 'N') = 'N' AND IFNULL(T1.BINARY_NAME, '') <> '' AND IFNULL(T1.OSS_NAME, '') = ''
